abstract: 'No matter how well you are trained, you are never well enough trained'.
description: Soon after landing in South Vietnam, John Vincent was sent to Pleiku to serve as a Platoon Commander. In telling of his time in Pleiku, John considers the cultural assumptions he made and the importance of his training in military action.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001960; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [April 2010]; Active; 2010
